options.name: Focused Evoker
options.description: Gain +1 Concentration and learn 2 Beginner and 1 Novice Evocation Spell.

options.name: Spellbound Weapon
options.description: If your Conduit is a Melee Weapon, it's attack becomes equal to your Spell Attack and it's Damage becomes equal to your Spell Damage Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Spell and Blade
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage and learn a Fighting Stance from the Stance Table

options.name: Reaction : Transference
options.description: In Response to taking Arcane, Psychic or Elemental Damage, roll a Spell Attack and reduce the Damage by that amount. Until the end of your next turn, your Weapon deals extra Primary Damage equal to the amount reduced.

options.name: Free Action : Elemental Weapon
options.description: You Channel a Beginner Evocation Spell at a weapon you have Equipped causing it to take on the Element of the Spell. For the next minute, the Sword deals Damage of that Element instead of its Primary Damage.

options.name: Action : Arcane Assault
options.description: You make an Attack with your Spellbound Weapon with a 1d4 Attack Bonus. If your Attack hits, all of the Damage is converted to Arcane and the next Spell you Channel before the end of your turn is automatically Charged.
